mapper.select: /** * Query ID : selectCode * Description : 공통 코드 조회 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT grp_cd, sys_cd, SYS_CD_NM FROM T_SYSDTL_C where GRP_CD = #{grp_cd}

/** * Query ID : selectDDLWork * Description : DDL 작업 정보 조회 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT (row_number() over()) as rownum , (row_number() over()) as idx , A.db2pg_ddl_wrk_id , A.wrk_id , A.db2pg_ddl_wrk_nm , A.db2pg_ddl_wrk_exp , A.dbms_dscd , A.ipadr , A.dtb_nm , A.scm_nm , A.ddl_save_pth , A.frst_regr_id , A.frst_reg_dtm , A.lst_mdfr_id , A.lst_mdf_dtm FROM( SELECT ddl_wrk_inf.db2pg_ddl_wrk_id , ddl_wrk_inf.wrk_id , wrkcng.wrk_nm as db2pg_ddl_wrk_nm , wrkcng.wrk_exp as db2pg_ddl_wrk_exp , (select sys_cd_nm from t_sysdtl_c where sys_cd = sys_inf.dbms_dscd ) as dbms_dscd , sys_inf.ipadr , sys_inf.dtb_nm , sys_inf.scm_nm , ddl_wrk_inf.ddl_save_pth , ddl_wrk_inf.frst_regr_id , TO_CHAR(ddl_wrk_inf.frst_reg_dtm,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as frst_reg_dtm , ddl_wrk_inf.lst_mdfr_id , TO_CHAR(ddl_wrk_inf.lst_mdf_dtm,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as lst_mdf_dtm FROM t_db2pg_ddl_wrk_inf ddl_wrk_inf, t_db2pg_sys_inf sys_inf, t_wrkcng_i wrkcng WHERE ddl_wrk_inf.db2pg_sys_id = sys_inf.db2pg_sys_id AND ddl_wrk_inf.wrk_id = wrkcng.wrk_id AND wrkcng.wrk_nm LIKE #{wrk_nm} AND sys_inf.dbms_dscd LIKE #{dbms_dscd} AND sys_inf.ipadr LIKE #{ipadr} AND sys_inf.dtb_nm LIKE #{dtb_nm} AND sys_inf.scm_nm LIKE #{scm_nm} ORDER BY lst_mdf_dtm desc )A
/** * Query ID : selectExrttrgSrctblsSeq * Description : 추출 대상 테이블 작업 ID SEQ 조회 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT setval('q_db2pg_exrttrg_srctb_ls_01',nextval('q_db2pg_exrttrg_srctb_ls_01'))
/** * Query ID : selectExrtexctSrctblsSeq * Description : 추출 제외 테이블 작업 ID SEQ 조회 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT setval('q_db2pg_exrtexct_srctb_ls_01',nextval('q_db2pg_exrtexct_srctb_ls_01'))
/** * Query ID : selectExrtusrQryIdSeq * Description : 사용자 쿼리 내역 ID SEQ 조회 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT setval('q_db2pg_usrqry_ls_01',nextval('q_db2pg_usrqry_ls_01'))
mapper.insert: /** * Query ID : insertUsrQry * Description : 사용자 쿼리 등록 * Author : 신예은 **/ INSERT INTO t_db2pg_usrqry_ls ( db2pg_trsf_wrk_id , tar_tb_nm , usr_qry_exp , frst_regr_id , frst_reg_dtm , lst_mdfr_id , lst_mdf_dtm ) VALUES ( #{db2pg_trsf_wrk_id} , #{tar_tb_name} , #{usr_qry_exp} , (select frst_regr_id from t_db2pg_trsf_wrk_inf where db2pg_trsf_wrk_id = #{db2pg_trsf_wrk_id}) , (select frst_reg_dtm from t_db2pg_trsf_wrk_inf where db2pg_trsf_wrk_id = #{db2pg_trsf_wrk_id}) , #{lst_mdfr_id} , clock_timestamp() )
mapper.select: /** * Query ID : selectDetailDDLWork * Description : DDL WORK 상세정보 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT db2pg_ddl_wrk_id , wrk_inf.wrk_id , wrkcng.wrk_nm as db2pg_ddl_wrk_nm , wrkcng.wrk_exp as db2pg_ddl_wrk_exp , db2pg_uchr_lchr_val , src_tb_ddl_exrt_tf , ddl_save_pth , db2pg_sys_id , db2pg_exrt_trg_tb_wrk_id , db2pg_exrt_exct_tb_wrk_id , (SELECT db2pg_sys_nm FROM t_db2pg_sys_inf WHERE db2pg_sys_id=wrk_inf.db2pg_sys_id) as db2pg_sys_nm , (SELECT exrt_trg_tb_nm FROM t_db2pg_exrttrg_srctb_ls WHERE db2pg_exrt_trg_tb_wrk_id=wrk_inf.db2pg_exrt_trg_tb_wrk_id) as exrt_trg_tb_nm , coalesce((SELECT length(exrt_trg_tb_nm)-length(replace(exrt_trg_tb_nm,',',''))+1 FROM t_db2pg_exrttrg_srctb_ls WHERE db2pg_exrt_trg_tb_wrk_id=wrk_inf.db2pg_exrt_trg_tb_wrk_id),0) as exrt_trg_tb_cnt , (SELECT exrt_exct_tb_nm FROM t_db2pg_exrtexct_srctb_ls WHERE db2pg_exrt_exct_tb_wrk_id=wrk_inf.db2pg_exrt_exct_tb_wrk_id) as exrt_exct_tb_nm , coalesce((SELECT length(exrt_exct_tb_nm)-length(replace(exrt_exct_tb_nm,',',''))+1 FROM t_db2pg_exrtexct_srctb_ls WHERE db2pg_exrt_exct_tb_wrk_id=wrk_inf.db2pg_exrt_exct_tb_wrk_id),0) as exrt_exct_tb_cnt , (SELECT src_table_total_cnt FROM t_db2pg_exrttrg_srctb_ls WHERE db2pg_exrt_trg_tb_wrk_id=wrk_inf.db2pg_exrt_trg_tb_wrk_id) as exrt_trg_tb_total_cnt , (SELECT src_table_total_cnt FROM t_db2pg_exrtexct_srctb_ls WHERE db2pg_exrt_exct_tb_wrk_id=wrk_inf.db2pg_exrt_exct_tb_wrk_id) as exrt_exct_tb_total_cnt FROM t_db2pg_ddl_wrk_inf wrk_inf, t_wrkcng_i wrkcng WHERE db2pg_ddl_wrk_id=#{db2pg_ddl_wrk_id} AND wrk_inf.wrk_id = wrkcng.wrk_id

/** * Query ID : selectDetailDataWork * Description : Data WORK 상세정보 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT db2pg_trsf_wrk_id , wrk_inf.wrk_id , wrkcng.wrk_nm as db2pg_trsf_wrk_nm , wrkcng.wrk_exp as db2pg_trsf_wrk_exp , db2pg_src_sys_id , (SELECT db2pg_sys_nm FROM t_db2pg_sys_inf WHERE db2pg_sys_id=wrk_inf.db2pg_src_sys_id) as source_dbms_nm , db2pg_trg_sys_id , (SELECT db2pg_sys_nm FROM t_db2pg_sys_inf WHERE db2pg_sys_id=wrk_inf.db2pg_trg_sys_id) as target_dbms_nm , db2pg_exrt_trg_tb_wrk_id , db2pg_exrt_exct_tb_wrk_id , (SELECT exrt_trg_tb_nm FROM t_db2pg_exrttrg_srctb_ls WHERE db2pg_exrt_trg_tb_wrk_id=wrk_inf.db2pg_exrt_trg_tb_wrk_id) as exrt_trg_tb_nm , coalesce((SELECT length(exrt_trg_tb_nm)-length(replace(exrt_trg_tb_nm,',',''))+1 FROM t_db2pg_exrttrg_srctb_ls WHERE db2pg_exrt_trg_tb_wrk_id=wrk_inf.db2pg_exrt_trg_tb_wrk_id),0) as exrt_trg_tb_cnt , (SELECT exrt_exct_tb_nm FROM t_db2pg_exrtexct_srctb_ls WHERE db2pg_exrt_exct_tb_wrk_id=wrk_inf.db2pg_exrt_exct_tb_wrk_id) as exrt_exct_tb_nm , coalesce((SELECT length(exrt_exct_tb_nm)-length(replace(exrt_exct_tb_nm,',',''))+1 FROM t_db2pg_exrtexct_srctb_ls WHERE db2pg_exrt_exct_tb_wrk_id=wrk_inf.db2pg_exrt_exct_tb_wrk_id),0) as exrt_exct_tb_cnt , (SELECT src_table_total_cnt FROM t_db2pg_exrttrg_srctb_ls WHERE db2pg_exrt_trg_tb_wrk_id=wrk_inf.db2pg_exrt_trg_tb_wrk_id) as exrt_trg_tb_total_cnt , (SELECT src_table_total_cnt FROM t_db2pg_exrtexct_srctb_ls WHERE db2pg_exrt_exct_tb_wrk_id=wrk_inf.db2pg_exrt_exct_tb_wrk_id) as exrt_exct_tb_total_cnt , exrt_dat_cnt , exrt_dat_ftch_sz , dat_ftch_bff_sz , exrt_prl_prcs_ecnt , lob_dat_bff_sz , usr_qry_use_tf , db2pg_usr_qry_id , ins_opt_cd , tb_rbl_tf , cnst_cnd_exrt_tf , trans_save_pth , src_cnd_qry , db2pg_uchr_lchr_val FROM t_db2pg_trsf_wrk_inf wrk_inf, t_wrkcng_i wrkcng WHERE db2pg_trsf_wrk_id=#{db2pg_trsf_wrk_id} AND wrk_inf.wrk_id=wrkcng.wrk_id

/** * Query ID : selectDetailUsrQry * Description : Data WORK user query 조회 * Author : 신예은 **/ select tar_tb_nm as tar_tb_name , usr_qry_exp as usr_qry_exp , frst_regr_id as frst_regr_id , frst_reg_dtm as frst_reg_dtm from t_db2pg_usrqry_ls where db2pg_trsf_wrk_id = #{db2pg_trsf_wrk_id} order by db2pg_usr_qry_id ASC;

/** * Query ID : selectDBMS * Description : DBMS 접속정보 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT db2pg_sys_id , db2pg_sys_nm , case when dbms_dscd ='TC002201' then 'ORA' when dbms_dscd ='TC002202' then 'MSS' when dbms_dscd ='TC002203' then 'MYS' when dbms_dscd ='TC002204' then 'POG' when dbms_dscd ='TC002205' then 'DB2' when dbms_dscd ='TC002206' then 'ASE' when dbms_dscd ='TC002207' then 'CUB' when dbms_dscd ='TC002208' then 'TBR' when dbms_dscd ='TC002209' then 'MYS' end as dbms_dscd , ipadr , dtb_nm , spr_usr_id , portno , scm_nm , pwd , (SELECT sys_cd_nm FROM t_sysdtl_c WHERE sys_cd=sys_inf.crts_nm) as crts_nm FROM t_db2pg_sys_inf sys_inf WHERE db2pg_sys_id=#{db2pg_sys_id}
